original_title: Robbie Williams: In And Out Of Consciousness
overview: Spread over two DVD's, this is the definitive collection of Robbie hits celebrating his impressive career to date; 57 millions album sold, 11 millions singles sold, seven UK No.1 albums (making him the biggest selling solo artist in the UK), a Guinness World Record for fastest ever ticket salesâ€¦ it's no wonder that he picked up the Outstanding Contribution To Music award at the esteemed BRIT Awards in London earlier this year!
title: Robbie Williams: In And Out Of Consciousness
